metadata.synopsis: A merregon - a footsoldier from hell assigned to assist the Orthon ( a huge infernal bounty hunter). Outside of combat, the merregon is unspeaking and unreactive. Upon attempting to read its thoughts, you realise it's little more than an empty vessel, without personality or thought.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Speak to the merregon after peacefully resolving SHA_Orthon_TrespassLairSteps:1. Use roll amazing in debug2. goto -676; -754 in Shar Temple3. enter the room nearby, walk towards the piles of dead bodies4. cinematic starts. Pick 1 -> 1 -> 1 -> 1 -> 1 -> 1 -> 25. wait for the troops to get into position6. use teleport S_SHA_Merregon_002 in debug
